title: all.bat build error: misc/cgo/test TestParallelSleep
body:
by **jon.forums**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd src
2. all.bat

What is the expected output?

ALL TESTS PASSED

What do you see instead?

...

# ..\misc\cgo\stdio

# ..\misc\cgo\test
--- FAIL: TestParallelSleep (1.00 seconds)
        basic.go:563: difference in start time for two sleep(1) is 230h28m58.362s
        basic.go:568: parallel 1-second sleeps slept for 829738.362000 seconds
FAIL
scatter = 004987E7
hello from C
FAIL    _/C_/Apps/go-hg/misc/cgo/test   1.185s

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

PS src> gcc --version
gcc.exe (rubenvb-4.7.4-release) 4.7.3

Which operating system are you using?

Win7 Ultimate 32bit

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

PS src> hg id
cc83df684054 tip
